Original:
店內裝潢俐落簡練空間明亮且座位寬敞，再加上店員熱情的招呼，進入店裡很快就可以完全放鬆下來。

調酒方面也蠻有特色的，推薦紫蘇系列的調酒香氣濃郁不刺激且順口，另外也有像是VSOP加上黑巧克力這種底蘊濃厚有味道的調酒選擇。

水煙的部分，從來不抽煙的我在店員的熱情介紹下本想著下次來就點看看，沒想到因緣際會認識了隔壁桌的朋友而被招待了，試了之後可以說算是有點開眼界了，原來抽水煙那個香氣的層次給人的感覺完全不輸一杯好的調酒。

食物方面只有點了一盤沒在菜單上的雞翅膀，火候不錯味道很棒就是有一點點鹹，價錢合理。

總結來說，店內舒適調酒很棒水煙也很值得一試，營業時間也蠻晚的算是給內湖這裡有一個不輸東區中山區的選擇。

值得一提店員 周周 真的是一大亮點，會一直在其他評論中看到是真的有道理的，上面講的都不想看的話，單純只是想喝酒不知道要去哪也可以因為她來這逛逛！
EN:
The interior of the shop is clear and concise and bright and spacious. Coupled with the enthusiastic greetings of the clerk, you can quickly relax in the store.

The bartending is also quite distinctive. It is recommended that the alcoholic aroma of the perilla series is strong, not irritating and smooth. In addition, there are vsop and dark chocolate.

In the water cigarette part, I never smoke. I was involved in the next time I came to see it next time under the enthusiastic introduction of the clerk. At the original level of the aroma of smoke smoke, it feels like a good cup of good bartending.

In terms of food, there is only a plate of chicken wings that are not on the menu. The taste is good and the taste is great, but it is a little salty and the price is reasonable.

In summary, the comfortable bartender in the store is also worth a try, and it is quite late to open the business.

It is worth mentioning that Zhou Zhou is really a highlight. It will always make sense in other comments. If you do n’t want to see it above, you just want to drink. This is shopping!
